thread.title: Chris Harrison Reveals Charlie O’Connell Was the One Bachelor He Just Didn’t Get Along With
thread.title_full: Chris Harrison Reveals Charlie O’Connell Was the One Bachelor He Just Didn’t Get Along With

title: Chris Harrison Reveals Charlie O’Connell Was the One Bachelor He Just Didn’t Get Along With
text:
Bachelor Chris Harrison Reveals Charlie O’Connell Was the One Bachelor He Just Didn’t Get Along With February 17, 2017 @ 5:05 PM 
Another twist for Bachelor Nation? Chris Harrison admitted that Charlie O’Connell was the one Bachelor star he just didn’t get along with. Watch what he had to say in the video above. The Weirdest ‘Bachelor’ and ‘Bachelorette’ Job Titles Ever! 
The longtime host of ABC’s dating show made the surprising admission while cohosting Live With Kelly on Friday, February 17, after Kelly Ripa grilled him on his least-favorite Bachelor. 
“This will just ruin my life for the next month,” the 45-year old joked, before 'fessing up. And while Bachelor Nation widely considers controversial season 18 star Juan Pablo Galavis to be the most-hated Bachelor ever, Harrison said it was actually 2005’s Bachelor Charlie O’Connell, who starred on season 7 of the reality dating show, who rubbed him the wrong way. Chris Harrison Kelsey McNeal/ABC via Getty Images 
“So here’s the thing, after 15 years, 30-some odd people that have been through this show, there are people I get along with better than others,” said Harrison, before naming O’Connell – whose actor brother Jerry O’Connell frequently slips into the Live cohost seat beside Ripa — as the one person he just didn’t “meld with” on their journey to find love.
